text: The leaders on whose backing man denies the Truth in this world will not be helpful to him on Doomsday. Today, they are each otherâ€™s companions, but when realities are revealed, they will start hating each other. It will appear as if a deadly barrier has come between them. In the present world they consider themselves safe and secure, but on Doomsday they are fated to find themselves standing on the threshold of Hell, unable to find an escape from it.
